= Resources =

== Subversion Access == 

IDBA Subversion repository can be checked out through SVN with the following instruction set:

  `svn checkout http://hku-idba.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ hku-idba-read-only`

Please refer to http://code.google.com/p/hku-idba/source/checkout get more information.

== Archive Download ==

From [http://code.google.com/p/hku-idba/wiki/Releases Releases] page you could get the version what you want.

Please refer to [http://code.google.com/p/hku-idba/wiki/InstallationGuideAndUserGuide Installation Guide] if you want to execute it.
